title: Pixel 3 slow motion camera results in "Something went wrong. Part of this video may not be saved."
content:
It's been like this for a year now. I've tried several suggestions like debugging the app, turning off assistant, uninstalling other camera apps, clearing cache and the like but it always results in the phone saving a video file that only plays the first few frames. 

Regular video works fine. It's only the slow motion feature.
